name.en: Application and implementation of smart energy efficient system

notice.ch: 以智慧永續生活微學程的優先

remark.ch: 以智慧永續生活微學程的優先

goal.ch: The objective of this course is to utilize a series of practical classes and a final project to equip non-computer science students with interdisciplinary knowledge and skills from basic sensor principles, electronic circuits, embedded systems, to integrated applications of the Internet of Things (IoT), extending to the field of smart energy efficiency
goal.en: 本課程的目標為利用一系列的實作課程與期末專題從基礎感測原理、電子電路、嵌入式系統、到物聯網的整合應用，讓非資訊科系的學生具備跨領域的知識與技術，並延伸至智慧節能的應用領域。

outline.ch:
智慧物聯網與智慧節能個案分享
Arduino ESP32 實作:ESP32基礎感測(紅綠燈、來客報知機)
Arduino ESP32 實作: 類比感測(瓦斯外洩警報)
Arduino ESP32 實作: 進階感測(DHT11、LCD、超音波)
定義問題:各組提出要解決的問題
Arduino ESP32 實作: 藍芽通訊互動
Arduino ESP32 實作: ThingSpeak網路圖表
Arduino ESP32 實作: GoogleSheet紀錄與異常Line緊急通知
各小組報告依選定的主題所設計的智慧節能系統規劃與工作項目
Arduino ESP32 實作: MQTT傳輸互動
Arduino ESP32 實作: Nodered儀表板製作
Arduino ESP32 實作: Nodered流程化互動介紹
Arduino ESP32 實作: 電壓電流監測模組
Arduino ESP32 實作: NBIoT與MQTT傳輸
Arduino ESP32 實作: ESP32CAM影像傳輸與MQTT
Arduino ESP32 實作: MCU休眠節能設定
期末成果發表(業師參與評審)
outline.en:
Case Studies of Smart IoT and Smart Energy Efficiency
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: Basic Sensing (Traffic Light, Visitor Alert)
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: Analog Sensing (Gas Leak Alarm)
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: Advanced Sensing (DHT11, LCD, Ultrasonic)
Problem Definition: Each group proposes a problem to be solved
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: Bluetooth Communication Interaction
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: ThingSpeak Network Chart
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: Google Sheet Recording and Line Emergency Notification of Abnormalities
Each group presents the planning and work items of the smart energy efficiency system designed for their selected topic.
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: MQTT Transmission Interaction
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: Nodered Dashboard Production
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: Nodered Process Interaction Introduction
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: Voltage and Current Monitoring Module
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: NBIoT and MQTT Transmission
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: ESP32CAM Image Transmission and MQTT
Arduino ESP32 Implementation: MCU Sleep Energy Saving Settings
Final Project Presentation (Industry experts participate in judging)


gradMethod.ch:
作業(20％)：每堂課都有實作作業，希望學生能於課堂中完成或是下周上課前繳交
■出席(20％)：每周出席狀況
■報告(20％)：學生須繳交期末報告
■成果展覽(40％)：學生須於期末成果報告與作品展示
gradMethod.en:
•Homework (20％): There will be practical assignments for each class, which students are expected to complete during the class or submit before the next class.
•Attendance (20％): Weekly attendance record will be taken into account.
•Report (20％): Students are required to submit a final report.
•Exhibition (40％): Students are required to present their final project and showcase their works at the end of the course
